text: 22.16: Mk 3.6 naŋga, 8.15 naŋga, 12.13Kamata nurɨŋandɨ sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋ naŋga Herotɨnduyɨndu kru muvɨraŋ sɨmbɨhu, Jisas kɨyɨmiyɨ uta nuŋ ambamu, Ahusɨki, ara naŋ ŋgandarɨŋ, na kandɨtaya ambavava mɨŋga. Kamata krunavundiŋ kuyu kandɨtaya Gotɨndu vana ambavarandana. Na kru mumɨŋgarɨm ndahara mambɨŋitundana. Na kruŋ kuyu sɨwɨmaña ndaya ambaramandana, ñɨmbi naŋga ŋɨnɨŋ naŋga ñɨmbi manɨman ŋɨnɨŋ.
